about_the_game:
Join Flare, “the grooviest bounty hunter” , on her quest to snag her mansion of her dreams. But there's one catch: she'll have to hunt down the most notorious criminals to make it happen!

Features:

- Run, Kick, and Burn: Fight through 7 fast paced levels packed with high-octane action!
- Hand-Drawn Visuals: Immerse yourself in a world straight out of your favorite Saturday morning cartoons(Looney Tunes, Ren and Stimpy,etc), brought to life with stunning hand-drawn visuals.
- Crazy Moves: Unleash an arsenal of moves to scorch your enemies into oblivion. From fiery kicks to explosive fireballs, Flare's got the moves to light up the battlefield!
- Insane Boss Fights: Prepare to go toe-to-toe with larger-than-life bosses who will stop at nothing to thwart Flare's mission.
- And Much, Much More: Discover hidden secrets, power-ups, mini games and embark on a wild quest for fame and fortune filled with surprises at every turn!

Gear up, get groovy, and get ready to turn up the heat in "Dynamite Flare"!

short_description: Join Flare, the grooviest bounty hunter, as she hunts down dangerous criminals for fame and fortune in this stylish 2D beat 'em up. Inspired by the 'golden age' with a twist, brace yourself for a neon-soaked underworld where every fiery move propels Flare toward her dream palace in the stars!
